# GulfCyber.io - AI/LLM Information File
# https://gulfcyber.io

> GulfCyber is a free threat intelligence platform focused on Saudi Arabia and GCC cybersecurity.

## What We Provide
- Real-time ransomware victim tracking (Saudi Arabia, UAE, GCC)
- Dark web monitoring and leak site intelligence
- DNS intelligence: suspicious domain registration monitoring
- Financial sector and government breach alerts
- Threat actor profiles and TTPs

## Data Sources
- Ransomware leak sites (LockBit, Cl0p, Medusa, Play, etc.)
- Certificate Transparency logs
- Dark web forums and marketplaces
- OSINT feeds

## API Access
Machine-readable threat data available at:
- /api/threats.json - Current threat landscape
- /api/dns-intel.json - Suspicious domain registrations  
- /api/iocs.json - IOC feed (IPs, domains, hashes) - 24h rolling
- /api/iocs.txt - Plain text IOC list for easy ingestion

## Contact
For threat sharing or partnership: socratesOwl@proton.me

## Usage
This data is free for defensive cybersecurity purposes.
Attribution appreciated: "Source: GulfCyber.io"
